location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has several holes in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter reports recent arrivals at Bushire including the Betsey SnowCaptain David Phillips and Drake SnowCaptain Lieutenant Jonathan Swift. The letter discusses sales of woolens in detail. It also reports news that Shaikh Nassir has returned the Ormuse [Hormuz] dow as mentioned in letter IOR/R/15/1/2, ff 32-33. It also states that Bushire's monthly accounts for January and February are enclosed (they are not contained in the file). Shipped by Admiral Pocock.
